tagline: A chrome and safari extension for live writing CSS on to any web page or html file
body:
### Live CSS Editor

A fast and easy to use extension for free-hand writing CSS on to a web page and previewing the changes.

### Authors and Contributors
Built, designed and supported by Jeremy Hubert (@jhubert).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the editor? Send a message and I'll be happy to help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Live CSS Editor
